item.title: I'm Sorry, Dave. I Can't Let You Use That Channel
item.description:
Despite the recent surge in spectrum auctions, leading to the perception that all available frequencies are allocated, opportunities for innovation remain. While unoccupied spectrum bands are scarce, similar to unclaimed land, existing communication channels often have unused capacity. The challenge in maximizing spectrum utilization stems from the operational nature of transmitters and receivers. Simultaneous transmissions on the same channel create interference, rendering communication unintelligible. This interference is noticeable with walkie-talkies, overlapping radio stations, and even WiFi networks and wireless phones sharing the 2...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/im-sorry-dave-i-cant-let-you-use-that-channel/
